data.name: Robolife Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Music created for and used in Robolife-Days with Aino

All music tracks from the game are included in MP3 and WAV format.

Notice
Only absolute music (instrumental) are include in this original sound track.
The music with lyrics are belong and created by another musician - Maou Tamashi (魔王魂)
Those contents will not be in this application.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: This is additional content for Robolife-Days with Aino, but does not include the base game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Storage: 26 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 421 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: wav & mp3
